TopicTitle: Looking for artist for T 'n' G logo

Articles.Content:
Hello fellow forumers. First off I'd like to say that I'm not really sure where this thread should go so it's in the Rocket builders section for now.

I have a small company that builds craft called Tape 'n' Glue Industries. As you can see the logo was a horrible and regrettable attempt by me to create a decent logo. I will never try to create a logo again. What I need is someone who can create decent looking logo for Tape 'n' Glue Industries. If you are interested you can tell me here in this thread or PM me I would appreciate it if people post logo designs here so that they are visible to everyone. If there are any submissions I might make a poll to have other people's opinion on which design is best.

Also, if anyone is interested in designing a logo feel free to stick to the general design I currently have or create something different.

Oh, one last thing, the text saying "Tape 'n' Glue Ind.", "simply effective", and "Aerospace Division" are not necessary, you can include them if you like but you don't need to.

Edited December 23, 2014 by A-Stax32
Moving this over to Fan Works, as that's where most of the artists hang out (and Rocket Builders is for craft requests / collaboration). Carry on, and best of luck
Thanks for moving this post. I had no idea where it went.
I'm working on something, stay tuned
Awesome. It's wonderful to see replies here, the KSP community is the best.

I took a stab at it. If you give me some feedback as to what you are looking for, I can change it. I just threw the red and white back there but I can change it to transparency or different colors or patterns. I replaced the 'n' with an ampersand because I thought it looked nicer, but I can change it back. Also, I considered putting a rocket silhouette in place of the letters, I could try that if you think it would look good. Let me know!

I also had this idea but i thought it was a bit silly. It's not really finished but if you like it I can work in this direction:
Went for more of a modernist approach here. Doesn't really capture the essence of Tape 'n Glue though... Oh well

I like the first logo a lot, would it be possible for you to include "ape" and "lue" beside 'T' and 'G' respectively? Also, would you mind making the white background transparent?

It looks great otherwise.

http://i.imgur.com/FsrFRib.png?1

Went for more of a modernist approach here. Doesn't really capture the essence of Tape 'n Glue though... Oh well

Looks good but you were right, it doesn't exactly stress the whole budget minded ideals of Tape 'n' Glue Industries LLC.

However we will be sure to use this logo for fund-raisers and shareholder meetings.

That looks beautiful. I will immediately replace the original Tape 'n' Glue logo with yours. I will be sure to credit you for your amazing work. Thanks a lot for your hard work.
